name: Earth Defenders (Sebas9710)
description:
Earth Defenders is a fun little co-op space shooter like game. The earth is being  threatened by a meteor rain! You and a friend have to keep it safe. But be careful! Your bullets also hurt your friend!

I made this game for a school project and I wanted to share it with you! I plan on adding and fixing a few things, so please, give me your feedback on what could be improved and changed, it will be highly appreciated!

That said, I hope you like it and have fun playing!
